messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3185
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/26/2003 6:47:35 AM Central Standard Time, ... I did this last year in Chicago and it was the most fun I have had in a long time! I belong
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/26/2003 6:47:35 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> About 2 years ago we had a local presentation of "Sound Of Music Sing
> Along".
> I wanted to go so desperately!! It was the movie, but everyone was allowed
>
> and encouraged to sing along at the top of their voice! Many people even
> came in costume!

I did this last year in Chicago and it was the most fun I have had in a long
time! I belong to a summer softball team that is composed mostly of middle
aged moms and we went to this as a "post season" activity. It was great to
see the movie on the big screen again and I was amazed that most of us
remembered ALL the songs. The words were superimposed on the bottom of the
screen, too, if you needed a little help. And yes, there were lots of folks
in costumes which just added to the fun of the whole experience. I highly
recommend doing this if you are able!!

Mary


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
